entityId.localType: Christian Brothers Oceania Province Archive Series Number

biogHist.abstract: This Archival Series contains individual student academic reports from the Christian Brothers schools in Clontarf and Bindoon. Held in 108 Archival Folders. Please note, sadly records are sometimes missing from Series like this one that cover such a wide period of time.
biogHist.p: People (and their relations) who spent time in 'care' with the Christian Brothers will generally be able to access or obtain a copy of records relating to their (or their relations) time in 'care'. To protect the privacy of people who spent time in 'care' the Christian Brothers may request proof of identity or relation in some circumstances before access to records or copies of records will be provided. In some cases original documents will be made available.
The Christian Brothers School Records series contains the following items:

list.item: Clontarf Student Reports for the years 1971 to 1979 for some students in Grade 7, 1st Year, 2nd Year and 3rd Year High School (later known as Years 7-10)
Clontarf Daily Conduct Book 1904 to 1907, which includes a score for general conduct and attention to work each day, and a monthly tally score for each child
List of World War II evacuees from Clontarf to Bindoon and Tardun
Clontarf Admission Forms for some students for the years 1947 to 1955. Many of these entries are incomplete

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Christian Brothers Oceania Province Regional Collection (1888 - )

resourceRelation.relationEntry: 'Student Academic Reports', in Find & Connect - Western Australia,
